title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Crisp the pancetta in a pan and set aside.
Whisk eggs with cheese and pepper.
Toss hot pasta with pancetta, then remove from heat and add egg mixture.
Stir quickly until creamy and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato sauce with warming spices.
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka masala paste for 30 minutes.
Sear chicken pieces until lightly charred.
Saute onion, then add tomatoes and simmer.
Return chicken to the pan and add cream.
Simmer until thickened and serve with rice.

title: Berry Chia Parfait
summary: A quick, layered breakfast with chia pudding, yogurt, and fresh berries.
steps: Whisk chia seeds, almond milk, and honey. Chill for 2 hours.
Layer chia pudding with yogurt in a glass.
Top with mixed berries and granola.
